Practical Computing and Bioinformatics for Conservation and Evolutionary Genomics Eric C. Anderson 2019-05-28 Preface Hi there, this is my great book. Why read this book It is very important… Structure of the book Chapters ?? introduces a new topic, and … Software information and conventions I used the knitr package (Xie 2015) and the bookdown package (Xie 2018) to compile my book.
